Enhancing education excellence in Deptford, South East London, or in any community, is important for several reasons
Read More
siama_uk@yahoo.com

- Individual Empowerment: Quality education equips individuals with knowledge and skills, empowering them to make informed choices, pursue their aspirations, and lead fulfilling lives.
- Economic Development: A well-educated workforce is essential for economic growth. It attracts businesses, creates job opportunities, and stimulates innovation.
- Social Mobility: Access to quality education can bridge socio-economic gaps, providing all individuals with an equal chance to improve their circumstances and break the cycle of poverty.
- Community Well-being: Strong educational institutions promote social cohesion, community engagement, and a sense of pride in one's locality.
- Health and Safety: Education can enhance public health awareness, promote safety, and contribute to a more informed and responsible citizenry.
- Global Competitiveness: A highly educated workforce enhances a community's global competitiveness and can attract investment and talent from around the world.
- Cultural and Artistic Enrichment: Education contributes to the development and appreciation of cultural, artistic, and creative endeavors, enriching the local culture.
- Innovation and Progress: A well-educated community is more likely to produce innovators and thought leaders, which can contribute to advancements in various fields.
- Environmental Responsibility: Education can instill a sense of environmental responsibility and promote sustainable practices, contributing to a cleaner and healthier environment.
- Reducing Crime: Access to quality education can be an effective crime prevention strategy, as it provides young people with opportunities and positive role models.
- Healthcare and Social Services: Education can lead to a more informed populace, resulting in better healthcare decisions and the efficient utilization of social services.
- Building Strong Communities: A community that values education tends to invest in its future, creating a virtuous cycle of continuous improvement and community pride.
- Political Engagement: An educated populace is more likely to be engaged in civic affairs, leading to better governance and a stronger democracy.
- Diverse Workforce: High-quality education can foster diversity, tolerance, and inclusivity, which can lead to a more diverse and inclusive workforce, fostering creativity and innovation.
- Sustainable Development: Education can promote sustainability principles, leading to a community that is environmentally conscious and mindful of long-term goals.
In summary, enhancing education excellence in Deptford, South East London, is crucial for the well-being and advancement of the community, the individuals within it, and society at large. It has wide-ranging benefits that go beyond just academics, impacting various aspects of life and contributing to the overall prosperity of the region.

Lewisham Mayoral Elections 2024 Needs a Visionary Leader Siama Qadar
On Thursday, March 7th, 2024, Lewisham residents will cast their votes in the by-election for Mayor.
Read More
siama_uk@yahoo.com

As a local candidate for Mayor of Lewisham in 2024, I am deeply committed to serving our community Lewisham Borough with compassion, integrity and dedication.
My promise to fulfill a full term mayoral and beyond which reflects my unwavering commitment to the people of Lewisham. With a focus on economic growth, social harmony, and environmental stewardship, I envision a Lewisham that thrives in all aspects.
From bolstering educational opportunities to ensuring accessible healthcare and affordable social and private housing, my priorities are aligned with the needs of our diverse population. In addition, fairer transport solutions, 20mphs and LTN'S schemes re-evaulated in light of sustainability, and a complete no to ULEZ.
Transparency and accountability are paramount in my approach to governance. I believe in open communication and active engagement with residents, fostering a culture of inclusivity and collaboration.
As you consider your vote, remember that together, we can shape the future of Lewisham for generations to come. Lewisham needs to be fixed and then uplifted to great heights and I am your candidate to do exactly this.
Join me in building a brighter tomorrow, today for our beloved Lewisham borough.
By election date 7th March 2024, please take photo ID. Cast your vote for Siama Qadar, and I pledge my promise to you that i will work night and day to deliver for the borough of Lewisham.
For more details on my candidacy and platform, visit the Lewisham Council Election Office website. https://lewisham.gov.uk/mayorandcouncil/elections/mayoral-by-election
Other candidates from the major political parties include Brenda Dacres from Labour and Co-operative party, Chris Maines from Liberal Democrates, Michael Herron from The Green Party.
Promoted by Alex Gill, on behalf of Siama Qadar, 77 Dartmouth Road, London SE23 3HT Content and views are of my own. Retweets does not mean endorsements.

Lewisham Shaped Who I am Today
Mayor of Lewisham, my vision for Lewisham is one of unity, progress, and shared prosperity.
Read More
siama_uk@yahoo.com

Dear Residents of Lewisham,
As I stand before you today, I am honored to present my heartfelt pledge to get selected for Mayor of Lewisham and to serve as your Mayor – the People's Mayor, Lewisham People’s Mayor, dedicated to fostering a Lewisham that thrives on betterment, success, prosperity, and a sense of community.
Raised in New Cross and Deptford, I was born in Lewisham Hospital to immigrant parents with roots hailing from in India and Pakistan. Coming from a working-class background, I pursued my education at Catford County Girls School and Haberdashers' Aske's Hatcham Girls School and later graduating from a London University.
I have walked the same streets, attended the same schools, and cherished the values that make Lewisham special.
Drawing on my extensive experience as a accomplished businesswoman, an international author, seasoned banker, and compassionate founder dedicated to addressing domestic violence and supporting the less fortunate with food distributions. Alongside my qualifications as a chartered accountant and a decade of international experience in Dubai, I offer Lewisham a distinctive skill set and a global viewpoint. Let's leverage these capabilities to bring forth innovative ideas that will uplift and benefit the community of Lewisham.
1. Economic Empowerment for All: I pledge to lead Lewisham towards economic empowerment for all its residents. Drawing upon my financial expertise, I will drill down into shortfalls and implement responsible budgeting practices, ensuring that our resources are utilized efficiently for the betterment of Lewisham residents in all aspects of concern.
My administration will build a database to actively support local businesses, encouraging entrepreneurship, and creating an environment where industries can flourish together sustainably.
Together, we will attract investments that fuel job creation, enabling every citizen to contribute to and benefit from our shared prosperity.
2. Global Insights for Local Growth: Having lived and worked in London and Dubai, I understand the importance of embracing global perspectives for local growth. I commit to leveraging the insights gained from my international experience to bring innovative solutions to the challenges faced by Lewisham. By fostering partnerships and collaborations, we can tap into a broader pool of ideas, technologies, and opportunities, positioning Lewisham as a dynamic and forward-thinking community.
3. Community-Centric Decision-Making: I firmly believe in the power of community engagement. My administration will prioritize transparency, open door policy, communication, and citizen participation.
Together, we will build a culture where every resident's voice matters. Regular town hall meetings, online forums, and accessible communication channels will be established to ensure that the decisions shaping Lewisham are reflective of the diverse needs and aspirations of our community.
4. Innovative Policies for a Brighter Future: In the spirit of progress, I will introduce and champion innovative policies across various sectors. From education and healthcare to infrastructure and environmental sustainability, my goal is to create a comprehensive plan that addresses the unique challenges facing Lewisham. Together, we will embark on a journey towards a better, progressive, brighter and more sustainable future for our children and generations to come.
5. A Mayor Accessible to All: I commit to being a mayor who is truly accessible to all residents. My office will have an open-door policy, and I will actively seek opportunities to engage with the community directly. Whether through neighbourhood events, regular office hours, or virtual town halls, I am dedicated to fostering a strong connection between the residents and their local government.
6. Building a United Lewisham: Community harmony is the bedrock of a thriving city. I pledge to work tirelessly night and day towards building bridges that unite us as a community.
By celebrating our diversity and embracing our shared values, we can create an inclusive environment where everyone feels a sense of belonging and pride in calling Lewisham home. In closing, my vision for Lewisham is one of unity, progress, and shared prosperity. I invite you to join me on this transformative journey.
Together, let us build a Lewisham that breaks the stagnation barrier and not only rises above to great heights but evolves into a beacon of success for all. Your support is not just a vote for me; it is a vote for the collective strength and resilience of our community.
Thank you for entrusting me with your hopes, and I look forward to meeting you all, for your votes and for the privilege of serving as your elected Mayor of Lewisham 2024.
Please connect with me on siama-uk@yahoo.com for any comments, questions or simply to say hello, i would love to hear from you. Facebook Siama, Twitter / X Siama Qadar

Siama, a passionate resident of Deptford, has taken on the challenging mission of transforming the local graffiti landscape. Her vision involves finding a harmonious balance between eradicating unwanted graffiti and nurturing the creative talents of graffiti artists in the community.
Siama's journey is a testament to the power of a committed individual and the resilience of a vibrant neighborhood. In this blog, we'll explore Siama's mission and the positive impact it has had on Deptford.
Siama's Mission Unveiled
Siama's mission to revitalize Deptford's graffiti scene began when she recognized the need to address unwanted graffiti that tarnished the aesthetics of the neighborhood. Simultaneously, she wanted to honor the rich artistic heritage of the area, deeply intertwined with the vibrant graffiti culture. Her goal was clear: to create a cleaner, more appealing environment while celebrating the artistic expressions that make Deptford unique.
Removing Unwanted Graffiti
Siama initiated her mission with a focused graffiti removal effort, enlisting the support of local volunteers, artists, and the community. Central to her approach was the importance of securing property owner consent before removing any graffiti. This method ensured that the mission respected property rights and fostered a collective sense of responsibility for the neighborhood. The removal efforts aimed to eliminate unwanted graffiti that marred Deptford's appearance, thus instilling a renewed sense of pride in the community.
Fostering Creative Spaces
Siama's mission was not solely focused on graffiti removal but also on providing dedicated spaces for creative graffiti artists to flourish. She recognized that many local artists possessed immense talent, and they needed a legal and open platform to express themselves. Here are the initiatives that unfolded:
The Positive Impact
Siama's mission to remove unwanted graffiti while fostering creative expression in Deptford had a profound and positive impact on the community:
The Road Ahead Siama's mission in Deptford continues to evolve, adapting to the ever-changing graffiti landscape. She understands that maintaining a balance between removal and creativity is an ongoing process that requires constant vigilance and community involvement. The mission serves as a symbol of unity and progress in Deptford, fostering a sense of responsibility and shared ownership of the neighborhood's appearance.
Siama's journey to remove unwanted graffiti and provide space for creative graffiti artists in Deptford serves as a testament to the power of an individual's vision and the resilience of a vibrant community.
Her mission demonstrates how balance and compromise can be achieved in addressing complex issues such as graffiti art. By respecting property rights, fostering creative spaces, and embracing the artistic diversity of the neighborhood, Deptford is transforming into a place where art thrives, community bonds grow stronger, and the neighborhood flourishes.
It's an inspiring example for other communities looking to navigate the delicate balance between graffiti removal and creative expression.

As the selected candidate for Mayor of Lewisham, I am committed to fostering a compassionate approach with an open-door policy for all.
When elected, transparency will be a cornerstone of my commitment, coupled with active listening to address the needs and requirements of Lewisham residents for a better and prosperous borough.
I believe in striving for the very best version of yourself, excelling in excellence and helping and supporting the community that shaped me to be who I am today.
I believe, in equality and inclusivity, transcending barriers related to backgrounds, religions, creeds, and gender.
Embracing diversity and recognising the inherent worth and dignity of every individual are important principles for fostering a more harmonious and just society. Promoting equality involves challenging stereotypes, prejudices, and discriminatory practices while actively supporting initiatives that strive to create a world where everyone has equal opportunities and rights. By embracing diversity, we can learn from each other, celebrate different perspectives, and contribute to a more enriched and understanding global community.

Mayor of Lewisham, my vision for Lewisham is one of unity, progress, and shared prosperity.

The creation of beautiful, affordable housing in Deptford, South East London, is a topic of paramount importance for several compelling reasons. Deptford, like many urban areas around the world, faces the challenge of housing affordability, and addressing this issue by building aesthetically pleasing yet affordable housing can have a significant impact on the community, the economy, and the overall well-being of its residents.
- Social Inclusion and Community Building:Building beautiful, affordable housing in Deptford promotes social inclusion by ensuring that people of various income levels can live in the same neighborhoods. Mixed-income communities encourage social cohesion and provide opportunities for people from different backgrounds to interact and learn from one another. This fosters a sense of belonging and unity, ultimately strengthening the community.
- Mental and Emotional Well-being:Beautiful housing environments can have a positive impact on mental and emotional well-being. Living in aesthetically pleasing surroundings can reduce stress, anxiety, and depression, enhancing residents' overall quality of life. This is especially important in urban areas like Deptford, where the demands of city life can often take a toll on residents' mental health.
- Economic Benefits:The development of affordable housing can stimulate economic growth in Deptford. By providing affordable housing options, more people can live and work in the area, increasing the local workforce. This, in turn, can attract new businesses and investments, leading to the creation of job opportunities and a stronger local economy.
- Reducing Commute Times:Building affordable housing within or near Deptford can help reduce residents' commute times, leading to improved work-life balance. This has both economic and quality of life benefits, as shorter commutes save time and money for individuals while reducing traffic congestion and environmental impact.
- Preserving Local Culture and Identity:Deptford has a rich cultural history and identity. The development of beautiful, affordable housing can be done in a way that respects and preserves the area's character and heritage. This not only ensures that the local culture remains vibrant but also helps attract tourists and cultural enthusiasts, contributing to the local economy.
- Environmental Sustainability:When designing beautiful affordable housing, there's an opportunity to incorporate sustainable building practices and technologies, reducing the environmental impact. This can include energy-efficient designs, the use of renewable energy sources, and green spaces that enhance the overall quality of life while decreasing the carbon footprint.
- Improved Education Opportunities:Affordable housing allows families to allocate more resources to education. In Deptford, this can lead to an increase in educational opportunities for children, contributing to their future prospects. Moreover, mixed-income neighborhoods can provide a more diverse range of role models and support networks for young people.
- Reducing Homelessness and Poverty:The availability of beautiful, affordable housing helps reduce homelessness and poverty in the area. By providing stable housing options, people are less likely to fall into homelessness, which, in turn, reduces the strain on social services and public resources.
- Attracting and Retaining a Diverse Workforce:Deptford's economic growth and prosperity depend on its ability to attract and retain a diverse workforce. By offering affordable, attractive housing options, the area can be more appealing to a wide range of professionals, including teachers, healthcare workers, and service industry employees, ensuring a balanced and thriving community.
- Enhanced Civic Pride:Beautiful housing projects that are thoughtfully designed and integrated into the existing urban fabric can instill a sense of pride and ownership among residents. This can lead to increased community engagement, volunteerism, and local activism, all of which contribute to the overall well-being of the neighborhood.
In conclusion, the importance of building beautiful, affordable housing in Deptford, South East London, cannot be overstated. It goes beyond mere shelter; it is a fundamental aspect of creating a vibrant, inclusive, and sustainable community. When housing is affordable and aesthetically pleasing, it can have a profound impact on the social, economic, and environmental well-being of the area, ultimately creating a better quality of life for its residents. Deptford has a unique opportunity to lead by example and set a standard for other urban areas looking to address the critical issue of housing affordability while enhancing the overall community experience.

On Thursday, March 7th, 2024, Lewisham residents will cast their votes in the by-election for Mayor.
Read MorePromoted by Alex Gill, on behalf of Siama Qadar, 77 Dartmouth Road, London SE23 3HT Content and views are of my own. Retweets does not mean endorsements.

Deptford, a vibrant community nestled in the heart of a bustling urban landscape, faces its fair share of challenges. Crime, like in many urban areas, is a pressing concern that demands innovative solutions. One such solution that often goes overlooked is the importance of better lighting. Adequate and well-designed lighting can play a significant role in crime prevention, enhancing public safety, and fostering a sense of security within the community. In this article, we'll delve into the multifaceted relationship between better lighting in Deptford and its role in preventing crime, ultimately creating a safer and more inviting environment.
One of the most immediate impacts of better lighting is its deterrence effect. Criminals are more likely to target areas that offer them anonymity and cover of darkness. Well-lit streets, parks, and public spaces make it difficult for potential offenders to go unnoticed, as they become more conspicuous to both pedestrians and law enforcement. The perception of increased surveillance and the fear of being identified act as powerful deterrents, discouraging criminal activity.
Improved lighting enhances visibility for all community members, creating a safer environment. It allows residents and visitors to navigate their surroundings with greater confidence. People feel more comfortable walking, jogging, or simply being outdoors, which encourages community engagement. With improved visibility, individuals can better detect potential threats, avoid hazardous situations, and report suspicious activity promptly, leading to a more proactive and vigilant community.
Better lighting helps reduce opportunities for crime by eliminating hiding spots and vulnerable areas. Dark alleyways, unlit corners, and secluded paths are often attractive to criminals for illicit activities. By illuminating these spaces, we limit their utility to wrongdoers. When criminals are denied the cover of darkness, they are less likely to commit crimes, reducing the chances of muggings, burglaries, and other illicit activities.
Improved lighting fosters a sense of community cohesion. A well-lit environment encourages people to gather, interact, and participate in communal activities. When public spaces are inviting and well-maintained, residents are more likely to engage with their neighborhood, leading to stronger social bonds and an increased sense of ownership in the community. In such cohesive environments, people are more inclined to watch out for one another, making it even more challenging for criminals to operate.
Well-lit areas also aid law enforcement in conducting surveillance effectively. Whether through patrolling or the installation of security cameras, the presence of better lighting allows law enforcement to monitor public spaces more efficiently. This helps to identify and respond to suspicious activities promptly, making it harder for criminals to evade capture. Improved surveillance contributes to a safer environment for all residents.
It is important to note that better lighting not only prevents crime but also has positive economic implications for Deptford. Safer neighborhoods are more attractive to residents, businesses, and investors. As crime rates drop, property values tend to increase, and local businesses thrive, leading to a stronger local economy. Additionally, increased foot traffic in well-lit areas can lead to higher consumer spending, creating a positive feedback loop of economic growth.
While we advocate for improved lighting, it's crucial to balance the need for safety with environmental concerns. Energy-efficient lighting options, such as LED bulbs, should be utilized to minimize the environmental impact and reduce energy costs. Properly designed lighting systems can also minimize light pollution, preserving the night sky for stargazers while still providing adequate illumination for safety.
Addressing the issue of better lighting in Deptford requires collaborative efforts from the local government, community organizations, and residents. Initiatives can include public awareness campaigns, community-driven lighting projects, and partnerships with local utility companies to ensure cost-effective lighting upgrades. When the community takes an active role in improving its lighting infrastructure, the benefits are more likely to be sustainable and effective.
In conclusion In Deptford, the importance of better lighting cannot be overstated in its role in preventing crime and fostering a safer, more welcoming environment. By enhancing visibility, reducing opportunities for crime, and promoting community cohesion, improved lighting makes the community less attractive to criminals.
Furthermore, it contributes to economic growth and sustainability. The implementation of energy-efficient lighting solutions and collaborative efforts among various stakeholders can lead to a brighter, safer, and more prosperous Deptford. It's time for Deptford to invest in better lighting and shine a light on a safer, more secure future for all its residents.
